title: Finance Minister proposes to introduce dedicated SME growth fund worth Rs 10 , 000 crore
description: The Finance Minister of India, Niramala Sitharaman, has proposed to introduce a dedicated 10,000 crores SME growth fund to create future jobs, incentivising enterprises based on select criteria
